snippet: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, Iran’s supreme leader, said its enemies would most likely try to sabotage the presidential election scheduled for June.
lead_paragraph: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, Iran’s supreme leader, said its enemies would most likely try to sabotage the presidential election scheduled for June.

headline.seo: Iran: Ayatollah Discourages Talk of Vote’s Fairness
headline.main: Iran: Ayatollah Discourages Talk of Vote’s Fairness
headline.print_headline: Iran: Ayatollah Discourages Talk of Vote’s Fairness
